sentences.english: He examined the old coins with a critical eye, being a perfectionist.
sentences.chinese: 因生性追求完美，他以批評的眼光檢驗着這些古幣。

sentences.english: Some old coins are now worth a great deal more than their face value.
sentences.chinese: 一些古幣現在的價值比它的面值大得多。

sentences.english: A jar full of ancient coins was raked up by them in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他們在花園裏刨出一個裝滿古幣的罈子。

sentences.english: He lit on some valuable ancient coins in his field.
sentences.chinese: 他在田裏偶然發現了一些有價值的古幣。

sentences.english: He had been copy the drawing of an antique coin.
sentences.chinese: 他正在臨摹一枚古幣的圖樣。

sentences.english: I'll never forget finding that rare old coin in my garden.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠不會忘記在我花園裏找到的那枚稀罕的古幣。

sentences.english: Father dug up an old coin in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸在花園裏掘到一枚古幣。

sentences.english: There is a good chance in this area that you might plough up some valuable ancient coins.
sentences.chinese: 在這塊土地上你很有可能用犁翻出一些值錢的古幣。

sentences.english: I am interested in collecting old coins.
sentences.chinese: 我對於收集古幣很感興趣。
